items.answer: We accommodate both small and large orders, with flexible manufacturing capabilities ranging from prototype to mass production runs.
items.question: What is your minimum order quantity?

items.answer: Yes, we maintain ISO 9001:2015 certification and have specialized aerospace and automotive manufacturing quality standards.
items.question: Do you have industry certifications?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-6 weeks depending on component complexity and order volume. Rush services available for urgent requirements.
items.question: What are your typical production lead times?

items.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in custom design and manufacturing of precision brass components tailored to specific client requirements.
items.question: Can you produce custom precision components?

items.answer: We primarily work with brass alloys, but also handle copper, bronze, and select aluminum alloys for specialized manufacturing needs.

aboutusintro.subtitle: Three Decades of Manufacturing Excellence and Innovation
aboutusintro.description: Shiv Brass is a leading precision brass component manufacturer with 30 years of industrial experience. Located in India, we specialize in high-quality manufacturing for automotive, aerospace, and industrial sectors.

items.name: Rajesh Kumar
items.content: Exceptional precision and reliability. Shiv Brass consistently delivers high-quality brass components that meet our stringent automotive manufacturing requirements.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: Outstanding custom manufacturing capabilities. Their expertise in producing complex brass components has been crucial for our aerospace projects.
